s_synopsis: In 21st century Earth is suffering from a depletion of natural resources. The nations initiate the Star Light Plan which will search space for additional resources. The resource investigation fleet is equipped with six Security Corps and 5000 military and research personnel. Four months later, the resource investigation team returns, their ships severely damaged by an alien space military called the Zeograd Army. Earth’s armies retaliate, but fail with every attempt. Lone scientist John Howard develops a space fighter called the Soldier Blade V.92 based on his research on the Zeograd. The ship is ready to combat the Zeograd Army...
